name: "My dear Handel": A "Great Expectations" Simulator
description:
You are Herbert Pocket, the best friend of Pip Pirrip. As you tend to Pip's injuries one evening, you talk with him about crime and marriage, consider your shared past, and contemplate the certain/uncertain future.

Basically just a little game about being a gay character in a 19th century British novel. No prior knowledge of Great Expectations required! Writers: Charles Dickens, me
